title: Healthy Pasta - Joseph Bastianich (epub) [MentalZero]
description:
Having grown up with Lidia Bastianich as their mother, Tanya and Joe Bastianich are no strangers to great-tasting Italian cooking. Today, the siblings both have illustrious careers in the culinary worldÃ¢â‚¬â€writing cookbooks, running restaurants, hosting television showsÃ¢â‚¬â€and yet they are still faced with the question that many of us encounter in the kitchen every day: how can we enjoy the pasta that we crave in a healthy and satisfying way?
